pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 20, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Markham, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Markham, Frank Scarpitti.

Aaniin Community Centre
5665 14th Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and present themselves to room 107C.
    • Parking is available in the Long Term Care Centre Visitor lot.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will highlight changes to the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Aaniin Community Centre
5665 14th Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and present themselves to room 107C.
    • Parking is available in the Long Term Care Centre Visitor lot.

Woodbridge, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Carpentersâ€™ District Council of Ontario executive.

Closed to media

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community barbeque with members of the Carpenters Union.

222 Rowntree Dairy Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.

Richmond Hill, Ontario

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the senior residents of Mon Sheong Court Richmond Hill.

Mon Sheong Court Richmond Hill
11211 Yonge Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 3:15 p.m. and present themselves to the activity room on the second floor.
